DOC.criteria: Age : > 18 year age Women : Premenopausal ( selfreport ) < 50 year age Men : < 50 year age BMI ( body mass index ) : 2740 kg/m2 ( need lose > 10 % body weight achieve healthy BMI ) Body weight stable last two month , actively weight loss plan No plan move area next two year Available able participate evaluation intervention study period Willing accept random assignment To enhance study generalizability , people medication note specific exclusion participate stable medication least three month Ability willingness give write informed No known active psychiatric illness Subjects follow condition exclude ( determined selfreport ) : Pregnant , lactating , within 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant next 2 year Diabetes ( type 1 2 ) history gestational diabetes hypoglycemic medication indication Prevalent diseases : Malabsorption , renal liver disease , active neoplasm , recent myocardial infarction ( < 6 month ) ( patient selfreport , available , review labs primary care provider ) Smokers ( effect weight lipid ) History serious arrhythmia , cerebrovascular disease Uncontrolled hyper hypothyroidism ( TSH within normal limit ) Medications : Lipid lowering , antihypertensive medication , know affect weight/energy expenditure Excessive alcohol intake ( selfreported , > 3 drinks/day ) Musculoskeletal disorder preclude regular physical activity Unable follow either two study diet reason food allergy ( e.g. , vegan ) Currently psychiatric care , take psychiatric medication Inability communicate effectively study personnel
